page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content:
There is a bus which comes every Thursday at quarter past ten.The time table is at the Buck Inn where the bus stops for people to get on or off.It takes them to Ripon via Snape.It is market day in Ripon.The bus gives the people time to shop before returning at 3.30pm.
The only other transport for public use is the post-bus which comes daily to Thirn and Watlass as it collects the afternoon post and delivers letters. It is a minibus. It costs forty-five pence to go from Thornton Watlass to Masham.
The postman collects the money and gives postage stamps in return. They are franked so that they cannot be used again.
